# tessell_vpc (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloud_type` (String) Tessell supported cloud types
- `name` (String) Name of the VPC
- `region` (String) Region of the VPC
- `subscription_name` (String) Subscription of the VPC

### Read-Only

- `cidr_block` (String) Cidr block of the VPC
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `metadata` (List of Object) Tessell Metadata for Vpc (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--metadata))
- `status` (String) Tessell Vpc Status
